Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.CreationFunction

public interface CreationFunction
A CreationFunction defines a Functor that creates a MappedObject given certain CreationInfo. This interface is used to tell FORM how a particular class of DomainObject can be constructed. The CreationInfo allows using a FORM specific constructor. See Learning FORM and the FORM Preprocessor for more information.

See Also:
MappedObject

valueWith(CreationInfo)
